participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outdoorsy and enthusiastic about fitness and spirituality.
participant_1.background: I read a lot about paganism and spirituality and try to live my life in accordance with those beliefs. I am the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco. I'm enjoying my time after college; jogging is a great way to stay in shape. I read ebooks on my commute and in my car, so I can enjoy my favorite books while I'm on the go. I am a dog walker.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and passionate about fitness and film.
participant_2.background: I just fed my dog. I love walking in the park. I sell clothing on Facebook. I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet. I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign film on Netflix.

content.text: Not much, just fed my dog and getting ready for my jog.
That's awesome! I love jogging too. What kind of dog do you have?
A black lab, his name is Buddy.
Aww, black labs are the best! I have a yellow lab, her name is Sadie.
It's funny you mention that, we're going to the park soon and I was planning on taking Sadie as well!
That sounds like a great idea, I'll see you there!
Oh, one more thing, I just got back from a trip to Europe and I'm really into foreign films now.
That's great! I love foreign films too, but I don't get to see them very often.
Well, if you ever want to watch some foreign films with me, I'd be happy to show you some!
That would be so much fun! I'll definitely keep that in mind.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
